'''''"I am a cat named Neko."''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during ''[[Seirai Stormchasers: Part I]].''

==Trivia==
* The name {{Lang|"I am a cat named Neko."|ja=うちは猫である。名前は寝子だにゃ}} is a reference to the first two sentences of the Japanese novel ''{{w|I Am a Cat}}'' by {{w|Natsume Sōseki|Natsume Souseki}}: {{ja|吾輩は猫である。名前はまだない。|tl=I am a cat. I do not yet have a name.}}
